metadata.Title: CVE-2020-21047 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The libcpu component which is used by libasm of elfutils version 0.177 (git 47780c9e), suffers from denial-of-service vulnerability caused by application crashes due to out-of-bounds write (CWE-787), off-by-one error (CWE-193) and reachable assertion (CWE-617); to exploit the vulnerability, the attackers need to craft certain ELF files which bypass the missing bound checks.

criterions.comment: elfutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
